text: Jesús María Tarriba Unger (born 1 September 1962) is a Mexican financial risk management expert. He has been the First Gentleman of Mexico since 2024. He is married to the President Claudia Sheinbaum. Tarriba is the first First Gentleman in Mexican federal history. Tarriba worked as an analyst for Banamex from 1994 to 1997. He later worked with Banco Santander from 2008 to 2016. Tarriba married Claudia Sheinbaum in 2023. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sinaloa Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Mexico
title: Jesús María Tarriba
